headline: 3 Brilliant High-Yield Stocks to Buy Now and Hold for the Long Term
summary: Black Hills has a 4.5% yield and is a Dividend King.  Chevron is offering a 4.9% yield with 38 annual dividend hikes behind it.  Enterprise Products Partners has a 6.8% yield backed by 26 annual distribution increases.
